author: Charlie Penwarden

cleaned_text: The great thing about quotes, and especially spiritual energy quotes, is that they can reaffirm our existing beliefs and they can also give us fresh perspective of thinking and framing our mindsets. Spiritual energy itself is hard to define. Hard to measure. And harder to control. In a sense, it's literally everything. This unseen ( [incorporeal](https://www.dictionary.com/browse/incorporeal)) force binds the universe together in harmonious function. This is a force that can dictate moments of life that exist beyond our control but we can also harness it-albeit partially, imperfectly, and impermanently. A good way to think about the concept of spiritual energy is to consider a lazy afternoon. As your eyes grow heavy, the choice that faces you is whether to go and take a nap or go for a run. Napping can rid your body of some of the tired feelings it has before but you may wake up groggy. That's because it doesn't add energy as a run would. Taking a mid-afternoon jog and getting your heart rate elevated is a way to harness the energy from your surrounding world. Related Read: [20 Spiritual Awakening Quotes For Total Enlightenment »](https://behaveo.com/spiritual-awakening-quotes/) 18 popular spiritual energy quotes Soulful, spiritual energy is similar. The harnessing of it requires diligent practice. When you feel irritated, you might "nap" by yelling, tapping your foot, or complaining to a friend. If, instead, you were to sit with that irritation—meditate and breathe through it—you may harness the spiritual energy from it and grow. Let the following 18 of the most popular spiritual energy quotes wash over you. If any of them stick out to you, read them again. If they still stand out, write them down and put them in front of you to keep as a reminder to who you are. "Life is energy and, as such, it belongs to all, reaches all, and blesses all." Donna Goddard "There has been a revolution in how we perceive the body. What appears to be an object, a three-dimensional anatomical structure, is actually a process, a constant flow of energy and information."— Deepak Chopra "Energy work is priceless. It makes every day extraordinary and transforms the mundane to the holy." Silvia Hartmann "Basically, there is simply nothing to worry about, because you yourself are the eternal energy of the universe."— Alan Watts "We have control over energy, frequency, and vibration. Through meditation, mindfulness, and thought/affirmation exercises, we can alter our personal energy and frequency and the rate at which we vibrate. This, in turn, will alter the things we attain and retain and the truths we attract into our lives." Hendrith Vanlon Smith Jr "Emotions are energies showing up to guide us" Jeanne McElvaney "Souls love. That's what souls do. Egos don't, but souls do. Become a soul, look around, and you'll be amazed-all the beings around you are souls. Be one, see one. When many people have this heart connection, then we will know that we are all one, we human beings all over the planet. We will be one. One love. And don't leave out the animals, and trees, and clouds, and galaxies-it's all one. It's one energy."— Ram Dass "I merely took the energy it takes to pout and wrote some blues."— Duke Ellington "Ride the energy of your own unique spirit."— Gabrielle Roth "If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency, and vibration."—Nikola Tesla "Everything is energy. All energy has a frequency, a vibration. White light is made up of the rainbow of colors, red with the lowest frequency and violet with the highest. Humans are made of matter, which is made of energy. If we take the most powerful microscopes and zoom in on any cell in the body, we go past the cells, DNA, base molecules, atoms, and electrons all the way down to quanta of energy and a lot of space. What is mind-blowing at this quantum level is that the act of observing these subatomic particles changes how they behave! It is as though they are aware of us and make decisions." Sandie Gascon "We are multiple in One. All vibrating energy." Elle Nicolai "Why they always look so serious in Yoga? You make serious face like this, you scare away good energy. Not to hurry, not to try too hard. Too serious, you make you sick. You can calling the good energy with a smile."— Ketut Liyer, the Balinese healer, relayed by Elizabeth Gilbert "Anyone who uses his energy for the sake of the vanities of the world is like someone who exchanges gemstones for gravel. There is no nobility in anyone who lacks faith. The wise man knows that the only fitting price for his soul is a place in Paradise..."— Abu Muhammad Ali ibn Hazm "Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution."— Pierre Teilhard de Chardin "I define God as an energy - a spiritual energy. It has no denomination. It has no judgments."— Debbie Ford "Energy can't be created or destroyed, and energy flows. It must be in a direction, with some kind of internal, emotive, spiritual direction. It must have some effect somewhere."— Keanu Reeves "We undertake certain spiritual exercises to achieve alignment with the creative energy of the universe."— Julia Cameron Conclusion A fascinating topic this is and explored by many familiar names here with their spiritual energy quotes from books, films and popular cultural references.
